pullrequest.title: pose frame semantics: Clean up motivation

content.raw:
I would prefer using regular sentences instead of putting lists inside `()`. Does the following still convey the same thing?

This allow frames to be used to compose information and minimize redundancy, such as specifying a link's pose relative to its parent / inboard joint.

It could also be used to abstract other information for inverse kinematics, visual servoing or sensor calibration by defining a camera pose using a frame instead of a base link and pose offset.
